amendment.description: Amendment codifies the EPA's longstanding silviculture rule. The amendment protects federal, state, county, tribal, and private forest roads from costly permit requirements or other point source regulation along with litigation expenses and citizen suit liability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to codify the EPA's longstanding silviculture rule. It protects federal, state, county, tribal, and private forest roads from costly permit requirements or other point source regulation along with litigation expenses and citizen suit liability.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
